document.full_text: tablets using google's android platform could overtake apple inc's red-hot ipad within three years as improved versions and more applications hit the market, the head of chip designer nvidia said.
document.title: nvidia head sees android beating apple
lines_and_colors: tablets using google's android platform could overtake apple inc's red-hot ipad within three years as improved versions and more applications hit the market, the head of chip designer nvidia said.
